mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEM_HIST (MEMBER_NO, PROJECT_NO, PROJECT_NM, INSTT_CODE, INSTT_NM, INPT_BGNDE, INPT_ENDDE, ROLE_CODE, CHRG_JOB, USE_LANG, REG_DATETIME, UPD_DATETIME, REG_ID, UPD_ID, NOTE, TEMP_COLUM) VALUES (#{MEMBER_NO}, #{PROJECT_NO}, #{PROJECT_NM}, #{INSTT_CODE}, #{INSTT_NM}, #{INPT_BGNDE}, #{INPT_ENDDE}, #{ROLE_CODE}, #{CHRG_JOB}, #{USE_LANG} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), null, #{REG_ID}, null, "", "")
mapper.select: SELECT HIST.MEM_HIST_NO , HIST.MEMBER_NO , HIST.PROJECT_NO , HIST.PROJECT_NM , HIST.INSTT_CODE , HIST.INSTT_NM , HIST.INPT_BGNDE , HIST.INPT_ENDDE , HIST.ROLE_CODE , HIST.CHRG_JOB , HIST.USE_LANG , HIST.REG_DATETIME , HIST.UPD_DATETIME , HIST.REG_ID , HIST.UPD_ID , HIST.NOTE , HIST.TEMP_COLUM , MEMBER.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME FROM TB_MEM_HIST AS HIST LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER AS MEMBER ON HIST.MEMBER_NO = MEMBER.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY HIST.MEMBER_NO
